title: Week 11 Final Exam: Wealth Management & Assets
description: Assessment on digital investment strategies, modern asset classes, and the precise use of 'for' and 'since' for durations.

questions.question: What is an ETF (Exchange-Traded Fund)?
options: A single stock in a tech company
A collection of many assets that you can buy as one unit
A physical safe for storing gold
A type of bank teller service
questions.explanation: Un ETF es un fondo que agrupa diversos activos (como acciones o bonos) y se negocia como una sola unidad.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'I have invested in this ETF __________ 2019.'
questions.explanation: Usamos 'since' para indicar un punto específico en el tiempo en el pasado (2019).

questions.question: What does a 'Robo-advisor' do?
options: It cleans your house while you sleep
It provides automated, algorithm-driven financial planning
It helps you withdraw cash from an ATM
questions.explanation: Un robo-advisor es una plataforma digital que usa algoritmos para gestionar tus inversiones automáticamente.

questions.question: Which term describes a collection of all your financial investments?
questions.explanation: El 'portfolio' (cartera) es el conjunto total de todas tus inversiones.

questions.question: Complete the duration: 'She has been a stock trader __________ twelve years.'
questions.explanation: Usamos 'for' para referirnos a un periodo de tiempo o duración (doce años).

questions.question: If an asset is 'volatile', what does that mean?
options: Its price is very stable and never changes
Its price fluctuates quickly and unpredictably
It is only available in physical banks
It is protected by the government
questions.explanation: La volatilidad indica que el precio de un activo cambia de forma rápida e impredecible.

questions.question: What is 'Yield' in the context of investing?
options: The total cost of the investment
The earnings generated on an investment over a period
The speed of the internet connection
The fee you pay to the broker
questions.explanation: El 'yield' (rendimiento) son las ganancias o intereses generados por una inversión en un tiempo dado.

questions.question: Complete the question: 'How __________ have you had this digital wallet?'
questions.explanation: 'How long' es la expresión estándar para preguntar por la duración de algo.

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of 'Diversification'?
options: It makes you pay more taxes
It reduces overall risk by spreading money across different assets
It allows you to buy more expensive cars
It stops the market from closing
questions.explanation: La diversificación reduce el riesgo al no concentrar toda la inversión en un solo activo.

questions.question: Complete: 'They have used that robo-advisor __________ they started working.'
questions.explanation: Usamos 'since' seguido de una oración que marca el inicio de una acción en el pasado.

questions.question: Which of these is a payment made by a company to its shareholders?
questions.explanation: El dividendo es la parte de los beneficios de una empresa que se reparte entre sus accionistas.

questions.question: Choose the correct Present Perfect sentence with 'for':
options: I have owned these shares for last Monday.
I have owned these shares for three months.
I have owned these shares for I was young.
I have owned these shares for 2020.
questions.explanation: 'Three months' es un periodo de tiempo, por lo que requiere el uso de 'for'.

questions.question: A 'Bond' is essentially a...
options: Loan you make to a government or corporation
questions.explanation: Un bono es un instrumento de deuda donde el inversor presta dinero a una entidad a cambio de intereses.

questions.question: Complete the experience: 'We haven't changed our portfolio strategy __________ the beginning of the year.'
questions.explanation: El inicio del año es un punto temporal específico, por lo que usamos 'since'.

questions.question: What happens if an investment has 'high volatility' and 'high risk'?
options: You are guaranteed to make a profit
The value can go up or down very significantly
The bank will pay you a fixed salary
questions.explanation: Alta volatilidad y riesgo significan que el valor puede cambiar drásticamente, tanto al alza como a la baja.

questions.question: How long __________ the market __________ open today?'
questions.explanation: Para el sujeto singular 'the market', usamos 'has been' en presente perfecto.

questions.question: Which word is used to describe units of ownership in a company?
questions.explanation: 'Stocks' y 'Shares' son los términos para referirse a las acciones de una empresa.

questions.question: Complete: 'I have held these government bonds __________ ages.'
questions.explanation: 'Ages' se considera un periodo de tiempo (aunque sea impreciso), por lo que usamos 'for'.

questions.question: A 'Broker' is someone who...
options: Buys and sells assets for you
questions.explanation: Un broker (corredor) es el intermediario que ejecuta las órdenes de compra o venta de activos.

questions.question: Complete the negative sentence: 'He has not checked his yield __________ last month.'
questions.explanation: 'Last month' es un punto de referencia temporal, por lo que se usa 'since'.
